name: Piloswine

evolution.description: Piloswine can evolve into Mamoswine at the time 'Ancient Power' is learned. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Swine Pokémon. Piloswine is covered by a thick coat of long hair that enables it to endure the freezing cold. This Pokémon uses its tusks to dig up food that has been buried under ice.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to moves that attempt to charm or taunt it.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Hail damage. It's AC is increased by 2 in arctic conditions, or when it is snowing or hailing.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: This Pokemon takes half the damage it otherwise would from Ice and Fire damage.
